description:
Bitwarden is a password manager. With this package you can keep your passwords safe in your server! 
 You can download the chrome / brave / firefox extension for bitwarden.
 The following tutorial https://github.com/nathPay/ansible-letsencrypt give you the possibility to add a domain name to your bitwarden server and then access it externally.
